goals.title: Provide User Authentication System
goals.description: Enable users to securely register and login to access the system
goals.rationale: User authentication is fundamental for system access and security

goals.title: Ensure High Performance
goals.description: Deliver fast response times to provide good user experience
goals.rationale: Fast response times are critical for user satisfaction and system usability

goals.title: Maintain High Availability
goals.description: Keep the system operational and accessible to users with minimal downtime
goals.rationale: High uptime ensures users can reliably access the system when needed

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Allow users to create new accounts using their email address
features.user_value: Users can create accounts to access the system

features.name: User Login
features.description: Enable users to authenticate and access their accounts using password credentials
features.user_value: Users can securely access their accounts and system features

constraints.description: Must use PostgreSQL as the database system
constraints.impact: Database choice is fixed, limiting flexibility in data storage options

constraints.description: System response time must be less than 200ms
constraints.impact: Performance requirements may influence architecture and technology choices
Requires robust infrastructure and monitoring to meet availability requirements

raw_content:
# Project Requirements

## Functional Requirements
- User can register with email
- User can login with password

## Non-Functional Requirements
- Response time < 200ms
- 99.9% uptime

## Constraints
- Must use PostgreSQL
